long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*THIS IS A PAID EXTENSION register at BirthdayAssistant.com/pre-launch

Never forget another clients' or friends' birthday ever again!!
Scheduled and send Facebook direct messages with just a click of a button. 

Birthday Assistant Chrome Extension will allow you to easily see today, tomorrows, upcoming, and recently passed birthdays all in one convenient place on your desktop.

Features Include in BETA PRE-RELEASE:
* Schedule messages to be sent in the future
* Choose from 20+ pre-written templates or create your own
* Customize with funny emojis to personalize each message
* Auto-sync every hour to show your most recent FB friends
* Download all your friends' birthdays to .CSV file
* Add their birthdays to your Google Calendar
* Get email & desktop notification for VIP birthdays

A lot more features coming soon!!
Thanks you for supporting us during Birthday Assistant V.1 PRE-LAUNCH.
